title: A man covers a distance of 12 km at the rate 4 kmph and other 4 km at 3 kmph. What is his average speed? - Quora

response.answer_text: Average speed = total distance / total time Total distance = 12+4= 16 km Time = 12/4 + 4/3 = 4 1/3 hours Average speed = 16/ 13/3 = 48/13 = 3.692 km/h ANSWER
